pages.title: Introduction
pages.text: Welcome to SkyBlock Create!$(br)A mod created by Snoeyz$(br2)The following pages will outline your journey through this modpack and help you understand how to achieve the ultimate automated skyblock island!

pages.title: Wasn't That Easy?
pages.text: Congratulations! Simply by opening up this book, you're already well on your way to becoming a SkyBlock Create master!$(br)By earning this achevement, you should find in your inventory a $(item)pulverizer$(), a $(item)hand crank$(), and a $(item)wrench$()!

pages.title: Introduction (cont.)
pages.text: The $(item)pulverizer$() can be used to do various tasks, like break cobblestone, gravel, logs, and ice down!$(br)The $(item)wrench$() can be used to rotate various contraptions, and by shift-clicking a contraption with the wrench, you can even pick contraptions up easily!$(br)While, eventually, you'll be able to fully automate many tasks, for now, you'll have to use the $(item)hand crank$() to power many of the contraptions in the early stages.
